title: How do I apply for an internship at the PESU Research Centre?

comments.body:
You will have a selection process usually just before the summer , keep an eye on your pesu app and email for selection process. the selection process may vary from center to center, its good to ask some guide from the center or a previous intern about the details.  
You can also ask any guide working in a center for a referral IF There are open positions in that center.

Thank you for the information! I’ll definitely keep an eye on the PESU app and my email. I don’t personally know any previous interns or guides, so if you have any suggestions on how I could reach out to someone or find out about open positions, I’d really appreciate it.

ISFCR and CCBD-CDSAML already sent out forms about 2 weeks back. CCNCS and CoDMav are still open till 30th April, check pesuacademy or the app once.  
You can also just walk into one of the centres and ask around, some profs might take you in if they have ongoing projects or are yet to fill positions for the summer.
